champ_0128_rival_01: Ta-ta-tachán! Here’s our battle court for today![npcn:4]
champ_0128_rival_02:
OK, right... Mm-hmm! Always important to check
what environment your Pokémon’ll be battling in![npcn:4]
champ_0128_rival_03:
The battlefield can have these teeny effects on
your Pokémon’s balance and stuff, y’know?[npcn:4]
champ_0128_rival_04:
Anyway, sorry I sorta dragged you here. But a
little pre-Gym warming up should do you good![npcn:4]
champ_0128_rival_05:
[BD06:0]Now c’mon, [trnm:0]!
Let’s\r
have\r
us\r
a\r
fruitful\r
battle![npcn:4]
champ_0128_rival_06a: That’s an L for me! Man, you’ve gotten so good![npcn:4]
champ_0128_rival_06b: That’s a W for me! You battled real well, though![npcn:4]
champ_0128_rival_07: I think that should be enough of a warm-up![npcn:4]
champ_0128_rival_08:
You and your Pokémon should be all set now.
Here—take these as thanks for the battle![npcn:4]
champ_0128_rival_09:
There’s just two Gyms remaining. Then all that’ll
be left is to try out to be a Champion! Give it all\r
you got![npcn:4]
champ_0128_rival_10: Now let’s get you back to the Gym lobby![npcn:4]
